spec: We need to dockerise this repo and provide a dockerUp.sh script in the root which will build this project into a docker container and run it using docker compose along with the other containers currently defined in the docker compose file.. So we need to add a dockerfile to run this node app as a container with a volume mapped persistance of the disk. The container should use the hldk.sh script to start just as if we ran it locally without being in a container
commitMessage:
Add Docker support with Dockerfile, updated docker-compose.yml, and dockerUp.sh script

- Added Dockerfile for containerizing the HLDK application
- Updated docker-compose.yml to include HLDK service
- Added dockerUp.sh script for easy container deployment
- Added volume mapping for data persistence
